alert.note: Alert for Simpson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 3:17PM EST until January 17 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow, possibly mixed with some sleet and freezing rain at times. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 3 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts possible. A light glaze of ice less than a tenth of an inch is also possible. * WHERE...Simpson County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight CST Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could become difficult. Higher snow totals could result in a few power outages due to the wet nature of the snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For Kentucky Road Conditions please visit http://goky.ky.gov
